about_the_game:
Welcome to the demo for Wesley Smith's Repair Game! Help Wesley Smith to collect items, craft weapons and defeat his opponents in this frustratingly funny arcade game. Compete against the merciless bots or up to three friends in couch co-op mode to become the master blacksmith!

This demo is free to play and contains the full gameplay loop of the full game with support for two players. Compared to the full release, the demo contains the following content:

Local multiplayer support for 2 players instead of 4

The demo is limited to 2 local players, but does support matches up to 4 players with additional bots.

4 out of 12 characters, 2 out of 7 game modes, and 4 out of 12 arenas available

In the demo you'll find the finest selection of characters, game modes and arenas to get yourself familiarized and give you a feel for the full game.

No generation of randomized arenas

You'll only find pre-made arenas in the demo; the option to generate randomized arenas is limited to the full game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Graphics: Graphics card with support for DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A controller is recommended, but not required

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
